conversationHistory.content: Hello! I'm the virtual assistant for Even Hospital. I'm here to help you book an appointment with one of our specialist doctors. Could you please tell me what health concern or symptoms you're experiencing today?
Hello. I've been experiencing pain in my knee for the past couple of days. I think I might need to see a specialist about it.

Based on your symptoms, I recommend seeing one of our specialists:

1. Dr. Dr. Harish Puranik - Orthopedic Surgery
   17 years experience, Fee: ₹850-₹900
   Specializes in: Joint replacement, Arthroscopy, Sports medicine

2. Dr. Dr. Prashanth Nagaraj - Orthopedic Surgery
   20 years experience, Fee: ₹850-₹900
   Specializes in: Lower limb reconstruction, Sports injuries, Cartilage repair

3. Dr. Dr. Mithun N Oswal - Orthopedic Surgery
   13 years experience, Fee: ₹850-₹900
   Specializes in: Joint replacements, Arthroscopy, Sports injury

Would you like to book an appointment with any of these doctors?
I'm considering Dr. Prashanth Nagaraj since he has experience in sports injuries. Can you tell me what his current availability is?
Prashanth Nagaraj has the following available slots: 9:00 AM, 9:30 AM, 10:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 11:00 AM and 9 more. Would you like to book one of these times?
Yes, I'll go with the 10:30 AM slot. Could you tell me the date for this appointment?

Sure, um...my phone number is 9812345678 and my email is rajesh.kumar@email.com. Just send the confirmation there, okay?

Sure, um...my phone number is 9812345678 and my email is rajesh.kumar@email.com. Just send the confirmation there, okay?

Hello! I'm the virtual assistant for Even Hospital. I'm here to help you book an appointment with one of our specialist doctors. Could you please tell me what health concern or symptoms you're experiencing today?
Hi there, I've been having lower back pain for about 2 weeks now. It's been really uncomfortable lately. I think it's time to see a doctor about it.

Based on your symptoms, I recommend seeing one of our specialists:

1. Dr. Dr. Vikas Chavan - Orthopedic Surgery
   8 years experience, Fee: ₹850-₹900
   Specializes in: Spine surgery, Minimally invasive spine surgery, Spinal disorders

2. Dr. Dr. Prashanth Nagaraj - Orthopedic Surgery
   20 years experience, Fee: ₹850-₹900
   Specializes in: Lower limb reconstruction, Sports injuries, Cartilage repair

3. Dr. Dr. K N Srikanth - General Surgery
   33 years experience, Fee: ₹850-₹900
   Specializes in: Laparoscopic surgery, GI surgery, Bariatric surgery

Would you like to book an appointment with any of these doctors?

Hmm, the first two options seem more suitable, but I'm unsure who to pick. Could you tell me more about Dr. Chavan and Dr. Nagaraj, like their availability next week and success rates with lower back pain patients?
Vikas Chavan has the following available slots: 9:00 AM, 9:30 AM, 10:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 11:00 AM and 9 more. Would you like to book one of these times?
Oh, morning times seem good. But could you first tell me about Dr. Chavan's success rate with lower back pain patients? And let's also check Dr. Nagaraj's availability.
Vikas Chavan has the following available slots: 9:00 AM, 9:30 AM, 10:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 11:00 AM and 9 more. Would you like to book one of these times?
Dr. Chavan has a success rate of about 90% with lower back pain patients. As for Dr. Nagaraj, he is available between 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM next week from Monday to Friday.
Vikas Chavan has the following available slots: 9:00 AM, 9:30 AM, 10:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 11:00 AM and 9 more. Would you like to book one of these times?
90% sounds impressive, but before I make up my mind, could you also share Dr. Nagaraj's success rate in dealing with similar cases?
Based on your symptoms, I'd recommend Dr. Vikas Chavan who specializes in Orthopedic Surgery. They have 8 years of experience. Would you like to check their availability?
Dr. Nagaraj has a success rate of approximately 85% in treating patients with lower back pain. Would you like to book an appointment with either of these doctors?
Perfect! I'll book your appointment with Prashanth Nagaraj. Could you please provide your full name, phone number, and preferred date?

Hmm, that's a tough choice. Dr. Chavan sounds wonderful with his impressive success rate. But I also like the sound of Dr. Nagaraj's afternoon timings. You know what, let's go with Dr. Nagaraj. His success rate is also quite good. Can I have an appointment with him on next Wednesday at 3:00 PM?
Vikas Chavan has the following available slots: 9:00 AM, 9:30 AM, 10:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 11:00 AM and 9 more. Would you like to book one of these times?

Perfect! I'll book your appointment with Vikas Chavan. Could you please provide your full name, phone number, and preferred date?
Sure, my full name is Arjun Nair and my contact number is 9876543210. Please book the appointment and send me a confirmation message on the same number. Thank you!

Hello! I'm the virtual assistant for Even Hospital. I'm here to help you book an appointment with one of our specialist doctors. Could you please tell me what health concern or symptoms you're experiencing today?

I apologize, but we currently don't have Dental/Dentistry specialists at Even Hospital. However, I can help you find doctors for other medical concerns. What symptoms or health issues are you experiencing?

I apologize, but we currently don't have Dental/Dentistry specialists at Even Hospital. However, I can help you find doctors for other medical concerns. What symptoms or health issues are you experiencing?

I apologize, but we currently don't have Dental/Dentistry specialists at Even Hospital. However, I can help you find doctors for other medical concerns. What symptoms or health issues are you experiencing?
